TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUserDataHandler implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable
type IUserDataHandler = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: When associating an object to a key on a node using Node.setUserData() the application can provide a handler that gets called when the node the object is associated to is being cloned, imported, or renamed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void handleData (short operation, string key, Java.Lang.Object data, Org.W3c.Dom.INode src, Org.W3c.Dom.INode dst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void handleData(int16 operation, string key, class Java.Lang.Object data, class Org.W3c.Dom.INode src, class Org.W3c.Dom.INode dst) cil managed
abstract member handleData : int16 * string * Java.Lang.Object * Org.W3c.Dom.INode * Org.W3c.Dom.INode -> unit

Docs.param: Specifies the type of operation that is being performed on the node.
Specifies the key for which this handler is being called.
Specifies the data for which this handler is being called.
Specifies the node being cloned, adopted, imported, or renamed. This is null when the node is being deleted.
Specifies the node newly created if any, or null.
Docs.summary: This method is called whenever the node for which this handler is registered is imported or cloned.
